alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and northeastern Oswego Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Southwick Beach State Park to 8 miles north of Central Square. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Torrential Rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. These storms have a history of producing 1.5 to 2.0 inches of rain. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Sandy Island Beach State Park, Stony Point, Pulaski, Adams, Dexter, Selkirk Shores State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Southwick Beach State Park, Hastings, Richland, Mexico, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Smithville, Orwell, Lorraine, Sandy Creek, and Lacona. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
